Ahh just tweak the coloring a bit is all your saying. and i could do something with the handle. lol ill try not to go overboard with my tweaks. most the time when i start tweaking i make a whole new model on accedent

item.title: The Lone Revenant
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

The name doesn’t really match what comes to mind when I look at the hammer…

When I look at it, I think something like related to the Tzhaar, or maybe the ancient pyramids in the desert.

Also, the hammer part (The black at the top of the handle) looks a little… crude. Talking about right here: http://puu.sh/g4uKQ/40f14d8111.png specifically. Why does it have the bend? I think it’d look better if that was just a straight connection to this part: http://puu.sh/g4uSA/b559cc90d3.png

Not ‘hating’ I’m just giving you feedback. Keep up the work, I think it looks great (esp. for making it from 1 prim.).
Also, I’m not a modeller so I can’t give feedback on the actual like… model. Just the looks.

Read full topic
